page.title: 14Alstonefield Communications
page.content: The communications that are available are:- The telephone for instant links with the rest of the world. The car which facilitates physical communications. The buses for transporting pedestrians from one area to another. {Bus timetable} Alstonfield-Ashbourne-Alstonfield Thur 10.15a.m. 12.00p.m. 12.30p.m. Thur 12.45p.m. 3.00p.m. 3.30p.m. Sat 10.25a.m. 12.15p.m. 12.45p.m. Sat 1.00p.m. 3.00p.m. 3.30p.m. The Royal Mail Service allows contacts with countries world-wide. The village notice board and the church news letter give local information and community contact. Word of mouth is a very important method of communication.
